channel.title: Research on Mircea Lungu
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Mircea Lungu

item.title: PhD Scholarship in Software Engineering
item.description: I am glad to announce that I have funding for a PhD student in the the Software Engineering and Architecture Research Group at the University of Groningen in the Netherlands. The Topic The Software Engineering and Architecture Research Group (SEARCH) carries research in software engineering in general with particular interest in architecture, cloud computing, software evolution analysis, and intelligent tools for software development. This particular position will be under the supervision of Dr.
